column1: @entity0 likes to play sports. He spends his time after school playing basketball andbaseball. Sometimes @entity0 pretends he is a famous baseball pitcher for his favorite teamwith his friends. He plays with his friends @entity2 and @entity3. @entity0 also plays pretendwhen he is alone. He has an imaginary friend named @entity4. @entity4 is an elephant who watchestelevision with @entity0.@entity2 likes playing baseball but she also likes to paint. @entity2's favorite class at schoolis art. She likes making pictures of flowers. Her teacher says she is a good artist. Shepainted a picture of a tree for her teacher. There were red and yellow leaves on it. @entity1 apples on it.When @entity3 goes home after baseball, he likes to eat a snack. He eats carrots andbananas. If he is a good boy his mom, Mrs. Smith, sometimes gives him milk andcookies. Afterwards, @entity3 finishes his homework.
